mapper.insert: insert into friend(id, pw, nickname, name, tel, email, college, major, auth, del, regidate, salt) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{college}, #{major}, 3, 0, now(), #{salt})

insert into friend(id, pw, nickname, name, tel, email, college, major, auth, del, regidate, salt) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{major}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{college}, #{major}, 1, 0, now(), #{salt})
mapper.select: select id, name, tel, email, college, auth, del, regidate from friend where email=#{email}
